skill.name: behaviors.skills.GetDecontaminated
skill.description: To get decontaminated through a decontamination site. The agent moves to decontamination site, and when it is reached, ask for decontamination. Once agent is decontaminated, it moves to a given garage position.

parameter.name: decontaminationPlot
parameter.description: The decontamination site to use. Efficiency (delays) of decontaminatin depends on units that are operating the decontamination site.

link.name: moveTo
link.description: To enact the decision to move to the decontamination site object.

link.name: getDecontaminated
link.description: To ask for decontamination upon movement termination.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the issued decontamination site is not able to decontaminate (see object capacities in authoring tool).
